oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Exposition cup, 1910
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Artifact 2016.003 Appalachian Exposition Knoxville, Tenn. Red glass cup with clear glass bottom (patterned) and handle. Gold lettering and gold trim on rim. Cup is 3” in diameter with about 1” clear glass handle. 1910.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Artifacts; Souvenirs; Fairs;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
